text: I'm about to build a piece of a project that will need to build and post an xml document to a web service, and I'd like to do it in Python as a means to expand my skills there.
Unfortunately, while I know the XML model fairly well in .Net, I'm uncertain what the pros and cons are of the XML models in Python.
Anyone have experience doing XML processing in Python?
Where would you suggest I start.
The XML files I'll be building will be fairly simple.
